modules.title: Foundation
modules.description: Premiere Pro Interface & Project Setup, Organizing Media, Timeline Basics, Editing Tools & Shortcuts, Proxies, Frame Rates, Keyframes, Masking, Time Ramping, and Green Screen.

modules.title: Bridge
modules.description: Fundamentals of Storytelling, Script Writing, Content Ideas, Voice Over Techniques, and Building On-Camera Confidence.

modules.title: Ground
modules.description: After Effects Interface, Compositions, Dynamic Linking with Premiere Pro, Shape Layers, Keyframe Graph Editor, Kinetic Typography & Text Animation.

modules.title: Momentum
modules.description: Classic 3D (Cameras, Lights, Layers), Roto Brush & Puppet Tools for simple animation, Camera & Motion Tracking, and an Introduction to Expressions.

modules.title: Catalyst
modules.description: Geo Layers for Map Animations, Creating Vox-style Map Graphics, and applying Cinematic Motion to PNG Maps.

modules.title: Forge
modules.description: Advanced 3D Camera Techniques, Mastering 3D Models & Lighting, and an Introduction to AI in Video Creation with Veo 3.

modules.title: Summit
modules.description: Promotional Video Editing, A-roll/Facecam Editing, and deconstructing styles like Magnetsmedia & Iman Gadzhi.

modules.title: Core
modules.description: Sourcing Music & SFX, Audio Ducking & Sound Theory, and an exploration of Advanced Color Theory.

modules.title: Blueprint
modules.description: Finding Your Niche, Content Research, YouTube Algorithm & SEO, Thumbnail Design, Camera Control, and Production Planning.
